If you're looking for a sci-fi movie with an intriguing plot, I recommend 'Allegiant' (2016). It follows Tris as she escapes beyond the wall in Chicago. The starring cast includes Shailene Woodley and Theo James.

Alternatively, if you're interested in a comedy with some unexpected twists, 'Magic Mike' (2012) directed by Steven Soderbergh might suit your mood. It stars Channing Tatum as Mike, a male stripper who teaches an aspiring young performer, played by Alex Pettyfer. The movie combines humor and drama with a few surprises.
